BATTLESHIP
Captain, place your Carrier.
SHIPS
ENEMY WATERS

Battleship Rules:

Place all of your ships on the board, then input your name and press 'Start Game'.

You begin your turn by clicking a tile on the enemy board (labeled 'Enemy Waters'). If you hit an enemy ship, you will see a bomb and the tile will turn grey. If you miss, you will see a X. After your shot registers, your opponent will choose a tile and simulate his turn in the same manner.

Whenever you hit all of the tiles of an enemy ship, the game will display that you sunk an enemy ship.

The first player to sink all of their opponent's ships wins the game.
